name: NeverEndingDrama
description:
This was originally intended for Oculus Rift DK2 for an installation at Art Contemporary Los Angeles in January 2016. 

More info here:

http://jeremycouillard.com/project2016.html#totem1

UPDATE: 11/11/17 - I updated it for Oculus CV1 using SDK 1.17 and Ue4. Should work on Vive, too. Let me know!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Put the red dot into the vortex. Totems come out. AI players interact with them and tell you stories. History builds up around you.

This was made for a swivel chair but you can also sit back and reorient yourself with the mouse if you want.
